contest-event.event-date:
July 11, 1931 D Belle Vue July Contest (Class B)
Belle Vue July Contest (Class B) 20 Test Piece Contest Belle Vue July Contest belle-vue-july-contest-class-b
Giralda [unknown arranger]
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes 1st £20, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £6, 5th £4.
March contest held in conjunction with Class A, 1st Bentley Colliery, 2nd Dove Holes Public, 3rd Blackburn Steel Works, 4th Cadishead, 5th Rivington and Adlington.
Source The Musical Progress and Mail, August 1931.
April 17, 2011, 5:46 p.m. Oct. 18, 2012, 4:48 p.m.

2 Barnoldswick Prize Band Joe Smith
3 Stalybridge Old Band F. Sykes
4 Gorton British Railways F. V. Forman
5 Hull Waterloo S. W. E Dawe
